scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:fonts
scripts.build:css: cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css assets/css/ && cp node_modules/bootstrap-icons/font/bootstrap-icons.min.css assets/css/ && cp node_modules/tom-select/dist/css/tom-select.bootstrap5.min.css assets/css/ && cp node_modules/flatpickr/dist/flatpickr.min.css assets/css/
scripts.build:js: cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js assets/js/ && cp node_modules/tom-select/dist/js/tom-select.complete.min.js assets/js/ && cp node_modules/flatpickr/dist/flatpickr.min.js assets/js/
